snippet.title: Shippin - Trailer
snippet.description:
Shippin
Shippin immerses you in the story of Salva, a fisherman who wakes up at sea without remembering anything of what happened to him, and his only goal is to discover how he got there. But, this will not be easy, in order to discover it, he will have to explore the mysterious islands of Shippin's world, while he fulfills diverse errands and obtains resources that will allow him to improve his ship, and thus to be able to face the adversities that are presented to him.

Obtenlo/Get It/ Obtê-lo/ここで購入:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3334100/Shippin/
